name: hai3-monorepo
description: HAI3: Human-driven development, AI-assisted, well structured and polished framework for SaaS control panels

scripts.build: npm run generate:colors && npm run build:packages && vite build
scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=@hai3/uikit-contracts && npm run build --workspace=@hai3/uikit && npm run build --workspace=@hai3/uicore
scripts.generate:colors: node scripts/generate-colors.cjs 2>&1 | grep -v 'warn -' | grep -v 'has been renamed' | grep -v 'Update your configuration' || true
